channel.title: Imperial || 718
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Banner Coming Soon[/B]
Imperial will be a server which will aim to provide a fun filled expierience with minimal downtime and countless hours of gameplay. Imperial will be a server where it'll be slightly easy to train combat related stats so you can get to Pking/Pvming but skiller related stats will be harder to train which will give you a sense of accomplishment and also give you an amazing new cape!
[QUOTE]ZombieZ Story Line
A young boy named Jack has been trapped in the ZombieZ dimension and you are the only one who can get him out of there, your task is to make a raft and find the horogathr key which will open the dimensional rift which will send you both back to the world of the living. If you run out of time you will be booted from the minigame and will lose you're entry fee of 1000k.[/QUOTE]
Update Log
[CODE] [07/25/2013] - Project Started [07/25/2013] - Home area moved to EdgeVille [07/25/2013] - Packaged the source to my needs [07/25/2013] - Removed un needed code cleaned up the Player class [07/25/2013] - Implemented ZombieZ and started working on it again [07/25/2013] - Combat Expierience rates have been made much faster [07/25/2013] - Many Npc spawns and random spawns added [/CODE]
[B]Credits[/B] DragonKK BongoProd `Luke
[B][SPOILER=Media][/B] [B]Media[/B] [img]http://puu.sh/3ExTF.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3As0N.png[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER]

[CENTER]Banner Coming Soon

Imperial will be a server which will aim to provide a fun filled expierience with minimal downtime and countless hours of gameplay. Imperial will be a server where it’ll be slightly easy to train combat related stats so you can get to Pking/Pvming but skiller related stats will be harder to train which will give you a sense of accomplishment and also give you an amazing new cape!

[QUOTE]ZombieZ Story Line

A young boy named Jack has been trapped in the ZombieZ dimension and you are the only one who can get him out of there, your task is to make a raft and find the horogathr key which will open the dimensional rift which will send you both back to the world of the living. If you run out of time you will be booted from the minigame and will lose you’re entry fee of 1000k.[/QUOTE]
